item.title: ðŸŽ‰ Nevalang Released!
item.description: After three years of hard work in private, I’m happy to say that Nevalang is ready for everyone to see! The Journey Since starting in June 2021, I’ve often worried if I could finish this project. I wondered if my idea would ever be ready to show to the world. Solving each problem was like fighting a monster that grows back its heads - as soon as I solved one thing, new problems appeared.
